RelatedSentence: TEHRAN ( FNA ) - Syrian activists distributed the picture of a woman said to be from the Syrian province of Deir Ezzur where opposing terror militias have fought for control with a message for terror chief Ayman Al Zawahiri .

A0: a Muslim woman from Deir Ezzur in Syria
RelatedSentence: The message , which she carried in the picture , reads , I am a Muslim woman from Deir Ezzur in Syria .
You have killed my family and you bombarded my children with utmost brutality .

RelatedSentence: The woman added that none of the people of Deir Ezzur would ever bow to radical Islamists even if it meant their complete annihilation , Islam Times reported .
